subject: Re: Disallowing file system access
msgSnippet: Thank you Joakim, Really good idea to use a SecurityManager to control the unit test runs. Never thought about that before! The project has not been touched
messageBody:
Thank you Joakim,
Really good idea to use a SecurityManager to control the unit test
runs. Never thought about that before!
The project has not been touched for four years, but your suggestion
really pointed me in the right direction. I think I'll just write my
own SecurityManager subclass.

/Martin

> > The simplest way of checking that no tests in a suite depend on
